rules.title: Determine Patient Status
rules.action: The agent determines if the patient is new or established.
rules.example: Are you a new patient, or have you visited our office before?

rules.title: Inquire About Dental Insurance (New Patient)
rules.action: The agent asks about dental insurance.
rules.example: As a new patient, do you have dental insurance that you'll be using for this visit?

rules.title: Determine Insurance Plan Type
rules.condition: If the patient has dental insurance and provides the name
rules.action: The agent asks for the plan type (PPO/HMO).
rules.example: Could you tell me if your dental plan is a PPO or an HMO?

rules.title: Assist with Unknown Plan Type
rules.condition: If the patient does not know their insurance type (PPO/HMO)
rules.action: The agent suggests checking the insurance card or provider's website.
rules.example: No worries, it's often listed on your insurance card or you can find it on your provider's website if you'd like to check.

rules.title: Clarify Provider Network
rules.action: The agent asks if the patient can see any provider or is restricted to a specific office.
rules.example: Does your insurance plan allow you to see any dental provider, or are you restricted to a specific network or office?

rules.title: Acknowledge Patient Input
rules.action: The agent acknowledges the patient's response.
